snippet: The Annoyance Theater, long a staple of the Chicago improv scene, has brought comedy theater to Brooklyn.
abstract: Jason Zinoman On Comedy column reviews performances at Williamsburg's Annoyance Theater, first comedy theater in Brooklyn and long a staple of Chicago's improv theater scene.
lead_paragraph: The Annoyance Theater, long a staple of the Chicago improv scene, has brought comedy theater to Brooklyn.

headline.main: Annoyance Theater Moves Brooklyn Into Comedy Theater Scene
